name: Chicken Alfredo
author: LISABERG
summary: A quick and easy chicken alfredo dinner with broccoli, zucchini, and red bell pepper. The sauce is enriched by cream cheese.
ingredients: 2  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cooked and cubed
½ cup chopped red bell pepper
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain
While pasta is cooking, melt cream cheese and butter in a skillet over low heat
Stir in milk, and season with garlic powder, salt, and pepper
Simmer for 3 minutes, or until thickened, stirring constantly
Mix in chicken, broccoli, zucchini, and red pepper
Cook 3 minutes over medium heat, then reduce heat, and simmer 5 minutes, or until vegetables are tender
